name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: ₹6,000 annual income support to small and marginal farmers.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Short-term loans for crop production and related activities.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance against natural calamities and pests.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides soil testing and recommendations for nutrient management.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: Promotes organic farming and cluster-based approaches.

name: eNAM – National Agriculture Market
description: Online trading platform for agricultural commodities.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: Funding support for states to improve agriculture infrastructure.

name: PM Kusum Yojana
description: Subsidy for installing solar pumps and grid-connected solar plants.

name: Gramin Bhandaran Yojana
description: Financial assistance for rural godowns/storage facilities.

name: PM Krishi Sinchai Yojana
description: Ensures irrigation for every farm (Har Khet Ko Pani).

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Wage employment support including agriculture-related work.

name: National Mission on Edible Oils
description: Supports oilseed farmers with improved technology and seeds.

name: Blue Revolution Scheme
description: Development of fisheries and aquaculture infrastructure.

name: National Bamboo Mission
description: Promotes bamboo farming and market linkages.

name: National Beekeeping and Honey Mission
description: Support for scientific beekeeping and honey production.

name: PM Awas Yojana (Rural Farmers)
description: Subsidy for housing construction in rural areas.

name: National Horticulture Mission
description: Promotes horticulture crops with technical support.

name: PM Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana
description: Free food grains for eligible low-income families.

name: National Livestock Mission
description: Support for dairy, poultry, and livestock farmers.

name: PM Gram Sadak Yojana
description: Infrastructure scheme improving rural roads for farmers.
